text: Skippy is a 1931 American comedy movie directed by Norman Taurog and was based on the comic strip of the same name by Percy Crosby. It stars Jackie Cooper, Robert Coogan, Mitzi Green, Jackie Searl, Willard Robertson, Enid Bennett, Guy Oliver and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1931 and was followed up by Sooky in 1931. ==Other websites== * Category:1931 comedy movies Category:1931 drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Taurog
title: Skippy (1931 movie)
